VisitedParty.name: VisitedParty
VisitedParty.description: Represents the contact person at the account thatâ€™s being visited.

ContactId.description: Required. Lookup to the person assigned as the contact at an account. This field references the Contact object.

IsPrimaryContact.description: Indicates whether the person is the primary visited party.

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

Name.description: Required. The name of the visited party.

VisitId.description: Required. Lookup to the Visit record this person is associated with.
